name: Tiny Knight (itch) (Paulo Soldera)
description:
This is my first project on Construct 2. I made it months ago, but just posted it now. You play a knight fighting the shadow forces while tries to reach the end of the level.

This is just a template. Maybe it can become a greater thing in the future.
Enjoy!

--- CONTROLS ---

Arrows: Move

Z or Up Arrow: Jump

X: Attack

A: Throw the Magic Orb, when you get it
